pullRequest.title: issue-179
pullRequest.bodyText:
🎨 Updated editor date pickers to listen to their text property in order to provide instant feedback (where the value property fails)
🎨 Updated the converters used by editor date pickers to use the TemporalFormatting.DATE_FORMATTER datetime formatter
🎨 SchemaVertexTypeUtilities.getTypeOrBuildNew and SchemaTransactionTypeUtilities.getTypeOrBuildNew now adds new types to schema
🎨 Improved blaze validation by checking for valid angle
🎨 Imporved vertex_attribute_name and transaction_attribute_name validation by ensuring typed names exist on graph
🎨 Renamed NodeGraphLabelsEditorFactory to VertexGraphLabelsEditorFactory
Description of the Change
Updated all editors using JavaFX Date Pickers to use Constellation's standard date format and to provide better feedback where there are errors
Alternate Designs
N/A
Why Should This Be In Core?
Better UX is always a good thing.
Benefits
N/A
Possible Drawbacks
N/A
Verification Process
Tested all editors using manual testing of custom attributes.
Applicable Issues
N/A

commit.message:
:art: Updated the converters used by editor date pickers to use the TemporalFormatting.DATE_FORMATTER datetime formatter
:art: SchemaVertexTypeUtilities.getTypeOrBuildNew and SchemaTransactionTypeUtilities.getTypeOrBuildNew now adds new types to schema
:art: Improved blaze validation by checking for valid angle
:art: Imporved vertex_attribute_name and transaction_attribute_name validation by ensuring typed names exist on graph
:art: Renamed NodeGraphLabelsEditorFactory to VertexGraphLabelsEditorFactory
:art: Updated editor date pickers to listen to their text property in order to provide instant feedback (where the value property fails)

nodes.bodyText:
Please note this should have a CHANGELOG.md entry.
Also a what's new regarding the bug fix will be good. I'll put something together and get you to review it @cygnus-x-1.

@cygnus-x-1 i'm not sure if you have noticed issues with Types but I think this line has introduced a bug. The CompareGraphsNGTest failing was an indication something was wrong. If you see strange issues with types showing up as Unknown then try removing this line. I need to debug more but a heads up.
